Thu Dec 28 03:13:44 PM UTC 2023
ğŸš sudo install -d /opt/include
ğŸš sudo ln -sf /opt/package/popt-1.19/include/popt.h /opt/include/popt.h
ğŸš sudo install -d /opt/lib
ğŸš sudo install -d /opt/lib/pkgconfig
ğŸš sudo ln -sf /opt/package/popt-1.19/lib/libpopt.so /opt/lib/libpopt.so
ğŸš sudo ln -sf /opt/package/popt-1.19/lib/libpopt.so.0 /opt/lib/libpopt.so.0
ğŸš sudo ln -sf /opt/package/popt-1.19/lib/libpopt.so.0.0.2 /opt/lib/libpopt.so.0.0.2
ğŸš sudo ln -sf /opt/package/popt-1.19/lib/libpopt.a /opt/lib/libpopt.a
ğŸš sudo ln -sf /opt/package/popt-1.19/lib/pkgconfig/popt.pc /opt/lib/pkgconfig/popt.pc
ğŸš sudo ln -sf /opt/package/popt-1.19/lib/libpopt.la /opt/lib/libpopt.la
